about_the_game:
Zombie VS Police is an incredibly addictive third-person shooter set in a post-apocalyptic world infested with zombies. In this game you have to play as a police officer who fights zombies and protects his hometown!

Try to survive in a city where a zombie virus is rampant! In this incredibly interesting game, you have to play as a real policeman who protects his city at the cost of his own life. Defend yourself from zombies attacking you. They want to eat you!!! In this game, you can drive a car and crush zombies. Immerse yourself in the world of the zombie apocalypse and protect the city! In the game you will find beautiful graphics and fun music!

Game Features:
Fun music and cool atmosphere!
Catchy, intuitive gameplay!
Incredibly beautiful city!
Very beautiful graphics!

name: Zombie VS Police

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1 64-bit or Windows 8.1 64-bit or Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 550 or ATI™ Radeon™ HD 6XXX or higher
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1 64-bit or Windows 8.1 64-bit or Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 770 or AMD R9 280
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

short_description: Zombie VS Police is an incredibly addictive third-person shooter set in a post-apocalyptic world infested with zombies. In this game you have to play as a police officer who fights zombies and protects his hometown!
